ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_sswrd | |- ( S C_ T -> Word S C_ Word T ) |
| 2 |  | #P_sswrd | |- ( T C_ S -> Word T C_ Word S ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_anim12i | |- ( ( S C_ T /\ T C_ S ) -> ( Word S C_ Word T /\ Word T C_ Word S ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqss | |- ( S = T <-> ( S C_ T /\ T C_ S ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqss | |- ( Word S = Word T <-> ( Word S C_ Word T /\ Word T C_ Word S ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_3imtr4i | |- ( S = T -> Word S = Word T ) |
